title: LISTEN: Gary Neville podcast featuring Arsenal v Chelsea
description: Gary Neville and Martin Tyler discuss the big talking points after Arsenal and Chelsea played out one of the games of the season.
content: Hector Bellerin's 92nd-minute equaliser rescued a point for Arsenal in a thrilling 2-2 draw with Chelsea at the Emirates.The result sees Chelsea and Arsenal remain third and sixth in the Premier League, with the Blues missing the chance to leapfrog Manchester United and the Gunners failing to move ahead of Tottenham.Following the result, Neville gave his views on all the big talking points from the Christmas period, including Manchester United's current form and the Philippe Coutinho transfer saga.Listen to more Gary Neville podcasts, and other Sky Sports Football podcasts here
